thread.title: BUZZ-RSA Insurance: Stock up on hopes of strong H1 helping takeover bid
thread.title_full: BUZZ-RSA Insurance: Stock up on hopes of strong H1 helping takeover bid

title: BUZZ-RSA Insurance: Stock up on hopes of strong H1 helping takeover bid
text:
27.30 -2.24 
** Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in RSA Insurance (LSE: RSA.L - news ) rise to 20-month highs as the British insurer is slated to report robust improvement in H1 earnings, which could give it leverage for its takeover by Zurich Insurance (Xetra: ZFI1.DE - news ) 
** Stock top gainer in the FTSE-350 Insurance Financial Index 
** A poll of 12 analysts have given a profit forecast range from 209 million to 273 million pounds for RSA's H1 results slated for Aug.6 
** Nomura cites media reports over the weekend on speculations that RSA could look for 600 p 
** Nomura says it sees a strong probability of the deal going through 
** Zurich Insurance said last week it was weighing a bid for RSA, and it would likely be in cash 
** RSA, best known for its More Than home and motor insurance brand, said it had held no talks with Zurich and received no proposal 
** RSA Insurance's shares posted their best one-day gain in 23 years last week after Swiss peer said it was considering offer 
** Zurich Insurance will also report H1 earnings on Aug.6 (aashika.jain@thomsonreuters.com)
